# hv_vcpu_get_vtimer_mask(_:_:)

**Function**

Gets the virtual timer mask.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vcpu_get_vtimer_mask(_ vcpu: hv_vcpu_t, _ vtimer_is_masked: UnsafeMutablePointer<Bool>) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **vcpu**: The ID of the vCPU instance.
- **vtimer_is_masked**: The value of the mask.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/HV_SUCCESS] if the operation was successful, otherwise an error code specified in [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t].

## Timer functions

- **hv_vcpu_set_vtimer_mask(_:_:)**: Sets or clears the virtual timer mask.
- **hv_vcpu_get_vtimer_offset(_:_:)**: Returns the vTimer offset for the vCPU ID you specify.
- **hv_vcpu_set_vtimer_offset(_:_:)**: Sets the vTimer offset to a value that you provide.
